text: 1.20 Lom 5.1, 2 Ko 5.18, Epe 1.7, 1.10, 2.13, 2.16, 1 Jo 2.2 Pen God gos ne anɨgɨl yek, binɨb akaŋ, tap tay adekab alaŋ lum awl mɨdeb okok, yad ayɨp jɨmñɨnɨmuŋ tek lup. Anɨb ak tek ne agek, Klays mab bak alaŋ kumek nɨkɨm sogek, kɨli God ayɨp penpen gɨpal ak kelɨgel, kɨlop God ayɨp dɨ jɨmñɨl lak.
